metadata.synopsis: The Player is fighting on the side of the drider against the Harpers. The Players just picked up the lantern that Harper Branthos wants.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Join ambush combat on the side of the drider.Kill or disarm the drider so he drops the lantern.Loot and equip the lantern.Observe AD from Harper Branthos.

0.speaker: Harper Branthos
0.text: The cultist has the lantern - take them out!
0.context: InternalNodeContext: 'the cultist' and 'them' both refer to the player - could be any gender
